Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium'

General_Description: '''Dear Demeter''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''In [[Elysium]], flowers are not mere decoration. Stolen away from her mother, [[Persephone]] pays tribute to [[Demeter]] with the lush sights and smells of blooming growth. Demeter sings on the winds brewing in the [[Heart of Elysium]], and can easily heard from the bed of white flowers where I wait.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Fields of Elysium]]''
